name: testidplugin
description: A Babel plugin to automatically inject `data-testid` attributes into JSX elements for testing purposes. This plugin works with React and TypeScript projects, ensuring that all relevant elements have unique and consistent `data-testid` attributes, making it easier to write tests with libraries like Jest, Testing Library, or Cypress.

scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ --access public

author: shashank rai
